sections.heading: space.The state shall furnish the commission and its commissioners with appropriate office space in Lincoln, Nebraska, together with suitable equipment, furniture, and supplies

sections.text:
77-5006.Office space.

The state shall furnish the commission and its commissioners with appropriate office space in Lincoln, Nebraska, together with suitable equipment, furniture, and supplies.

SourceLaws 1995, LB 490, ยง 6.
